g.text: User enters a URL, and the
Client fetches metadata URL to find
User visits their authorization endpoint and sees the authorization request
Authorization endpoint fetches client information (name, icon)
User authenticates, and approves the request. Authorization
endpoint issues authorization code, builds redirect back to client.
Client exchanges authorization code for an
access token by making a POST request
Token endpoint verifies code and returns
canonical user profile URL with an access token
if it differs from the original,
and the user is logged in
